title: Pampered to Heaven by RIch Husband - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Businessmen   Celebrities   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Showbiz   System Administrator   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters
author: 我才不是小饼干
description:
Once she woke up, Cheng Youran found herself transmigrating as a beautiful yet empty canary fated to die out of depression after divorce. When the villain husband passes over the divorcement contract, her eyes brighten up once she sees 1.5 billion alimony written on the paper.

She decides to break from this marriage!

During the signing period, Lu Zixiao, the villain husband, is suddenly bound with the Raising a Pampered Wife system.

With a blank face, he tears apart the divorce agreement: We are not getting a divorce.

People are surprised to discover the president of Lu Group buying the largest domestic entertainment company to fulfill his wife’s dream of becoming a Film Empress and purchasing millions of jewels just to bring a smile to his wife’s face. How is this still the same indifferent Lu Zixiao?>
